meanings.definition: To rouse to action or effort; excite or invigorate
meanings.sent1: The delicious smell of fresh cookies stimulates my desire to bake.
meanings.sent2: Listening to music stimulates creativity in many people.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a talking dog stimulates laughter in the audience.
meanings.sent4: Her passionate speech stimulates a wave of inspiration among the listeners.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the painting stimulate a sense of joy and energy.

meanings.sent1: Regular exercise stimulates muscle growth and strength.
meanings.sent2: Positive feedback stimulates students to perform better in school.
meanings.sent3: The promise of a reward stimulates hard work and dedication.
meanings.sent4: The sunrise over the mountains stimulates a sense of awe and wonder.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh flowers stimulates a feeling of happiness and peace.

meanings.definition: To excite to action or feeling
meanings.sent1: The thrilling movie stimulates my heart rate with suspense.
meanings.sent2: The surprise party stimulates excitement and joy in the birthday girl.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected plot twist stimulates shock and disbelief in the audience.
meanings.sent4: The beautiful sunset stimulates a sense of tranquility and peace.
meanings.sent5: The roller coaster ride stimulates a rush of adrenaline and thrill.
